nodes.text: Sakidopa, which could be translated as "Second Saki," was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space.
Sakidopa was a colony world of the Sakiyan species. It served the unique purpose of being a mining colony for the Sakiyan Collective.

Sakidopa was settled to support Saki's growing repulsorlift industry. The Sakiyans mined an exotic element called graxitium on the planet. Sakiyan scientists and technicians used a secret process to enrich the element at a facility near the Godsheart. The Sakiyans then used the enriched graxitium to make their repulsorlift circuitry.
